data.name: DHARMA: THE SWAN
data.detailed_description:
You occurred is located in station 3 or the Swan it will be for the next 540 days. The station 3 was originally constructed as a laboratory where scientists could work to understand the unique electromagnetic fluctuations emanating from... ...not long after the experiments began however there was an incident and since that time following protocol has been absurd.

Every 108 minutes the button must be pushed from the moment the alarm sounds you will have four minutes to enter the code into the microcomputer processor touched into the program when the alarm sounds either you must input the code... ...important that when the alarm sounds the code be entered correctly and in a timely fashion. I do not attempt to use the computer for anything…

Congratulations! Until your replacement arrived the future of the project is in your hands on behalf of the DeGroots Alvar Hanso and all of us at the dharma initiative thank you. Namaste and good luck.

Enter code "11" to get into the computer settings
Enter code "*2" to get into the monitor settings

All other codes are secret.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, vista, xp
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E5300 2.60 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
